Marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
Marksmanship.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid shots.
Charged Attack: Perform a more precise attack with increased damage. While aiming, Pyro accumulates in the arrowhead. When fully charged, the arrow deals high Pyro DMG.

Explosive Puppet.name: Explosive Puppet
Explosive Puppet.info: Throws a Baron Bunny decoy which taunts nearby opponents. Baron Bunny inherits HP proportional to Amber's Max HP. Upon destruction or expiration, Baron Bunny explodes and deals Pyro DMG to all surrounding opponents. Hold to adjust the throwing distance and direction.

Fiery Rain.name: Fiery Rain
Fiery Rain.info: Unleashes Fiery Rain which rains down from above and deals Pyro DoT.

Every Arrow Finds Its Target.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
Every Arrow Finds Its Target.info: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10%, and AoE by 30%

Precise Shot.name: Precise Shot
Precise Shot.info: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots increase Base ATK by 10% for 10s

Champion Glider.name: Champion Glider
Champion Glider.info: Decreases all party members' gliding Stamina Consumption by 20%.

Whisper of Water.name: Whisper of Water
Whisper of Water.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

Let the Show Begin.name: Let the Show Begin
Let the Show Begin.info:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies and afflicting them with the Wet status.
Melody Loop:

Barbara's Normal Attacks heal all party members and nearby allied characters for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
Her Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
Regenerates a certain amount of the current's character's HP at regular intervals.
Applies the Wet status to the character and enemies who come in contact with them.

Shining Miracle.name: Shining Miracle
Shining Miracle.info: Heals friendly forces and all parties for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

Glorious Season.name: Glorious Season
Glorious Season.info: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

Encore.name: Encore
Encore.info: When a character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is extended by 1s. The maximum extension is 5s.

Give It Your All.name: Give It Your All
Give It Your All.info: When Barbara cooks a boiled dish, the Perfect zone on the cooking meter is twice the normal size.

Oceanborne.name: Oceanborne
Oceanborne.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 successive strikes.
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Tidecaller.name: Tidecaller
Tidecaller.info:
Press: Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.
Hold: Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.Counterattacks with the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. The shield possesses the following properties:

When attacked, it will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the Counterattack. This increase can take place twice within the ability's duration.
Increases Beidou's resistance to interruption.
Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
Applies the Electro element to Beidou.

Stormbreaker.name: Stormbreaker
Stormbreaker.info:
Thunderbeast's Targe:
When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between enemies, dealing Electro DMG.
Increases Beidou's resistance to interruption.
Triggers a maximum of 1 lightning discharge per second.

Retribution.name: Retribution
Retribution.info: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

Lightning Storm.name: Lightning Storm
Lightning Storm.info:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

Ironclad.name: Ironclad
Ironclad.info: When Beioud cooks a DEF dish, her perfect cooking range is increased by 100%.

Strike of Fortune.name: Strike of Fortune
Strike of Fortune.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword swings.

Passion Overload.name: Passion Overload
Passion Overload.info:
Bennett concentrates the spirit of Adventure and Pyro into his blade. Depending on how long he charges for, different effects occur.
Tap: Performs a quick flaming swing with his sword.
Short Hold: Performs a two-stage attack that deals Pyro DMG and launches enemies.
Long Hold: Performs a three-stage attack that does Pyro DMG. However, the last attack causes an explosion, launching both Bennett and his enemies. Bennett is not hurt by this explosion.

Fantastic Voyage.name: Fantastic Voyage
Fantastic Voyage.info:
Bennett jumps towards the enemy and attacks, dealing Pyro DMG and creating an inspiration circle.
If the health of a character in the circle is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate.
If the health of a character in the circle is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus equal to a set percentage of Bennett's Base ATK.
In both cases, characters inside the circle with also gain the Pyro affix.

Fearnaught.name: Fearnaught
Fearnaught.info: When inside Fantastic Voyage's circle, Passion Overload's CD is decreased by 50% and Bennett cannot be launched by this skill's explosion.

Demonbane.name: Demonbane
Demonbane.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost.name: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost
Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost.info:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all DMG done through Normal and Charged Attacks by Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters will be converted to Cryo DMG.

Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star.name: Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star
Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star.info:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch enemies.

Steady Breathing.name: Steady Breathing
Steady Breathing.info: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal Attack SPD increased by 8%.

Rimechaser Blade.name: Rimechaser Blade
Rimechaser Blade.info: When the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit will be summoned to strike nearby enemies, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Enemies hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

Gallant Journey.name: Gallant Journey
Gallant Journey.info: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

Tempered Sword.name: Tempered Sword
Tempered Sword.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Searing Onslaught.name: Searing Onslaught
Searing Onslaught.info:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.
This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period (5s).

Dawn.name: Dawn
Dawn.info: Flames emerge from Diluc, knocking back nearby enemies. The flames then converge into the blade, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.

Relentless.name: Relentless
Relentless.info: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

Blessing of Phoenix.name: Blessing of Phoenix
Blessing of Phoenix.info: For 12s after using Dawn, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus and his Normal and Charged Attacks deal Pyro DMG.

Cook for Battle.name: Cook for Battle
Cook for Battle.info: Diluc gains 1 additional Proficiency when he performs a Perfect Cooking.

Bolts of Downfall.name: Bolts of Downfall
Bolts of Downfall.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the en

Nightrider.name: Nightrider
Nightrider.info: Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE.For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby enemies with Freikugel.Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.

Midnight Phantasmagoria.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
Midnight Phantasmagoria.info:
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
Greatly decreases the DMG Fischl takes.
Deals Electro DMG to enemies she comes in contact with.

This ability can be canceled prematurely by leaving the field. Once this ability's effects end, it will return a portion of its Energy Cost.

Stellar Predator.name: Stellar Predator
Stellar Predator.info: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

Lightning Smite.name: Lightning Smite
Lightning Smite.info: If a character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the enemy shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

Mein Hausgarten.name: Mein Hausgarten
Mein Hausgarten.info: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, the time consumed is reduced by 25%.

Favonius Bladework.name: Favonius Bladework
Favonius Bladework.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an enemy using the power of wind. Launched enemies will slowly fall to the ground.

Gale Blade.name: Gale Blade
Gale Blade.info:
Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.
Hold: At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding enemies towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration.

Dandelion Breeze.name: Dandelion Breeze
Dandelion Breeze.info:
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding enemies and causing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for nearby allied units and all party members. HP restored scale off Jean's ATK.
Dandelion Field: Continuosuly regenerates HP for one ally and imbues them with the Anemo attributes. Deals Anemo DMG to enemies entering or exiting the Field.

Wind Companion.name: Wind Companion
Wind Companion.info: Hits by Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

Let the Wind Lead.name: Let the Wind Lead
Let the Wind Lead.info: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

Continuous Improvement.name: Continuous Improvement
Continuous Improvement.info: When Jean crafts Talent Materials, she has a 20% chance to receive an additional crafted item.

Ceremonial Bladework.name: Ceremonial Bladework
Ceremonial Bladework.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword swings.

Frostgnaw.name: Frostgnaw
Frostgnaw.info: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of Kaeya.

Glacial Waltz.name: Glacial Waltz
Glacial Waltz.info: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to enemies in their path for so long as they persist.

Sword of Cruelty.name: Sword of Cruelty
Sword of Cruelty.info: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

Heart of the Abyss.name: Heart of the Abyss
Heart of the Abyss.info: Enemies Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles. Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

Energy Thirst.name: Energy Thirst
Energy Thirst.info: When Kaeya crafts Character and Weapon Materials, he has a 20% chance to receive an additional crafted item.

Yunlai Swordsmanship.name: Yunlai Swordsmanship
Yunlai Swordsmanship.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Stellar Restoration.name: Stellar Restoration
Stellar Restoration.info:
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her enemies like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to enemies in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.
Hold: Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.
Lightning Stiletto: If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:

If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.

Starward Sword.name: Starward Sword
Starward Sword.info:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AoE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby enemies simultaneously that deal multiple instances of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.

Thundering Penance.name: Thundering Penance
Thundering Penance.info: Within 5s of recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Electro DMG.

Aristocratic Dignity.name: Aristocratic Dignity
Aristocratic Dignity.info: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

Land's Overseer.name: Land's Overseer
Land's Overseer.info: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

Kaboom!.name: Kaboom!
Kaboom!.info:
Normal Attack: Throws thing that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to enemies after a short casting time.

Jumpy Dumpty.name: Jumpy Dumpty
Jumpy Dumpty.info:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-band-fun!
When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and ealing AoE pyro DMG with every bounce.
On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines. The mines will explode upon contact with enemies, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Starts with 2 charges.

Sparks 'n' Splash.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
Sparks 'n' Splash.info: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby enemies, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Pounding Surprise.name: Pounding Surprise
Pounding Surprise.info: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

Sparkling Burst.name: Sparkling Burst
Sparkling Burst.info: When a Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

Lightning Touch.name: Lightning Touch
Lightning Touch.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 Electro attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG to all enemies in front after a short casting time.

Violet Arc.name: Violet Arc
Violet Arc.info:
Press: Releases a homing lightning orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.
Hold: After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to enemies based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them and clears their Conductive stacks.

Lightning Rose.name: Lightning Rose
Lightning Rose.info:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

Induced Aftershock.name: Induced Aftershock
Induced Aftershock.info: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to enemies.

Static Electricity Field.name: Static Electricity Field
Static Electricity Field.info: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

Potion Insight.name: Potion Insight
Potion Insight.info: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to receive a 200% yield.

Sparkling Scatter.name: Sparkling Scatter
Sparkling Scatter.info:
Normal Attack: Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

Jade Screen.name: Jade Screen
Jade Screen.info:
Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing Aoe Geo DMG.
Jade Screen

Blocks enemy projectiles.
Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.

Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at a time.

Starshatter.name: Starshatter
Starshatter.info:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her enemies that deal massive Geo DMG.
If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

Backup Plan.name: Backup Plan
Backup Plan.info: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

Strategic Reserve.name: Strategic Reserve
Strategic Reserve.info: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

Meticulous Calculation.name: Meticulous Calculation
Meticulous Calculation.info: When Ningguang crafts Character and Weapon Materials, she has a 20% chance to recover the materials used.

Favonius Bladework - Maid.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid
Favonius Bladework - Maid.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 consecutive slashes
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attack on all nearby enemies. At the end of the sequence, performs an additional powerful slash.

Breastplate.name: Breastplate
Breastplate.info:
Summons protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding enemies and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.The shield has the following properties:
When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters, both on and off the field
Applies the Geo element to the character.
Possesses 250% Absorption Efficiency against Geo DMG

The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on on Noelle's DEF.

Sweeping Time.name: Sweeping Time
Sweeping Time.info:
Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the enemies surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG.Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
Larger attack AoE
Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG
Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

Devotion.name: Devotion
Devotion.info: When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when the active character's HP falls below 30%: Creates a shield that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.

Nice and Clean.name: Nice and Clean
Nice and Clean.info: Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.Hitting multiple enemies with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

Maid's Knighthood.name: Maid's Knighthood
Maid's Knighthood.info: When a  Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

Ancient Sword Art.name: Ancient Sword Art
Ancient Sword Art.info: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost.info:
Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby enemies.
Herald of Frost

When Qiqi hits a target with her Normal or Charged Attacks, she regenerates HP for all party members and all nearby allied characters.  Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
Regenerates HP for current character at regular intervals.
Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in its path.

Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune.info:
Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within ther body, marking nearby enemies with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cyro DMG.
Fortune-Preserving Talisman

When enemies affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

Life-Prolonging Methods.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
Life-Prolonging Methods.info: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

A Glimpse into Arcanum.name: A Glimpse into Arcanum
A Glimpse into Arcanum.info: When Qiqi hits enemies with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s.  This effect can only occur once every 30s.

Former Life Memories.name: Former Life Memories
Former Life Memories.info: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

Steel Fang.name: Steel Fang
Steel Fang.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Claw and Thunder.name: Claw and Thunder
Claw and Thunder.info:
Press: Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to enemies in front of Razor.Upon striking an enemy, Razor gains an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.
Hold: Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

Lightning Fang.name: Lightning Fang
Lightning Fang.info:
The Wolf Within:
Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES.
Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status.
Disables Razor's Charged Attacks.

Awakening.name: Awakening
Awakening.info: Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%. Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

Hunger.name: Hunger
Hunger.info: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharged by 30%.

Wolvensprint.name: Wolvensprint
Wolvensprint.info: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina Consumption by 20%. The greatest effect out of all Talents of the same type prevails.

Wind Spirit Creation.name: Wind Spirit Creation
Wind Spirit Creation.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack: Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308.info: Creates a small Wind Spirit that deals Anemo DMG to enemies in an AoE, pulling them towards the location of the Wind Spirit before launching them.

Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type I.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type I.info:
Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull and launch nearby enemies, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.
Elemental Absorption: If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

Catalyst Conversion.name: Catalyst Conversion
Catalyst Conversion.info: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, characters in the party with the matching element have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

Mollis Favonius.name: Mollis Favonius
Mollis Favonius.info: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hit an enemy, increases other party members' Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

Astable Invention.name: Astable Invention
Astable Invention.info: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

Foreign Ironwind.name: Foreign Ironwind
Foreign Ironwind.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Palm Vortex.name: Palm Vortex
Palm Vortex.info:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to enemies in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
Hold: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
Elemental Absorption: If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

Gust Surge.name: Gust Surge
Gust Surge.info:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.
Elemental Absorption: If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

Slitting Wind.name: Slitting Wind
Slitting Wind.info: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

Second Wind.name: Second Wind
Second Wind.info: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

Divine Archery.name: Divine Archery
Divine Archery.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Skyward Sonnet.name: Skyward Sonnet
Skyward Sonnet.info:
Press: Summons a Wind Domain at the enemy's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.
Hold: Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected enemies into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.
Enemies hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

Wind's Grand Ode.name: Wind's Grand Ode
Wind's Grand Ode.info:
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in object and enemies along its path, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.
Elemental Absorption: If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

Embrace of Winds.name: Embrace of Winds
Embrace of Winds.info: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

Stormeye.name: Stormeye
Stormeye.info: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restored 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

Windrider.name: Windrider
Windrider.info: Decreases all party members' gliding Stamina Consumption by 30%. The greatest effect out of all Talents of the same type prevails.

Dough-Fu.name: Dough-Fu
Dough-Fu.info:
Normal Attack: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.

Guoba Attack.name: Guoba Attack
Guoba Attack.info: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire at the enemy, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Pyronado.name: Pyronado
Pyronado.info: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.

Crossfire.name: Crossfire
Crossfire.info: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

Beware, It's Super Hot!.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
Beware, It's Super Hot!.info: When Guoba Attack's effects end, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

Chef de Cuisine.name: Chef de Cuisine
Chef de Cuisine.info: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

Whirlwind Thrust.name: Whirlwind Thrust
Whirlwind Thrust.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 6 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack: Dive down and impact the ground, causing damage relative to the falling height. Can only be triggered in mid-air.

Lemniscatic Wind Cycling.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
Lemniscatic Wind Cycling.info: Xiao Lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to enemies along the path. Can be used in mid-air. Has 2 charges to begin with.

Bane of All Evil.name: Bane of All Evil
Bane of All Evil.info: Takes on the form of the yaksha that terrified both demons and archons alike millennia ago. For its duration, increases Xiao's attack range and DMG, while converting damage type to Anemo and enhancing Xiao's Jumping Ability. Maintaining this form continuously drains Xiao's HP.

Evil Conqueror - Tamer of Demons.name: Evil Conqueror - Tamer of Demons
Evil Conqueror - Tamer of Demons.info: Starting Bane of All Evil increases Xiao's DMG by 5%. After this, Xiao's DMG continues to increase by 5% every 3s until the skill ends. Max 25% increase.

Dissolution Eon - Heaven Fall.name: Dissolution Eon - Heaven Fall
Dissolution Eon - Heaven Fall.info: When Lemniscatic Wind Cycling is used, increases all subsequent Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's DMG by 10% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. Duration refreshes with new stacks.

Transcension - Gravity Defier.name: Transcension - Gravity Defier
Transcension - Gravity Defier.info: Decreases all party member's falling DMG by 30%.

Guhua Style.name: Guhua Style
Guhua Style.info:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen.name: Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen
Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen.info:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, his ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit the character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:

When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increase the character's resistance to interruption.
20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.

Guhua Sword - Raincutter.name: Guhua Sword - Raincutter
Guhua Sword - Raincutter.info:
Rainbow Bladework:
Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attack, dealing Hydro DMG.
Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.
These effects carry over to other characters.

Hydropathic.name: Hydropathic
Hydropathic.info: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 8% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

Blades Amidst Raindrops.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
Blades Amidst Raindrops.info: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.
